blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary: In The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, a photo of Princess Peach appears as part of a sidequest where a goat named Christine...
caption:
In The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, a photo of Princess Peach appears as part of a sidequest where a goat named Christine (note the name under the photo) attempts to make another character believe she looks like Peach. Here is an animated comparison of the photo in the original version (monochrome) and the remake, Link’s Awakening DX (colored).
Main Blog | Twitter | Patreon | Store | Small Findings | Source

summary:
Dr.Mario: Whoa
Simon: What?
Dr.Mario: You’re-a O negative. You’re A universal donor.  You can-a give you’re blood to...
body:
Dr.Mario: Whoa

Simon: What?

Dr.Mario: You’re-a O negative. You’re A universal donor.  You can-a give you’re blood to anybody.

Simon: Or nobody, you f***ing vampire.

summary: New Persona Title Incoming, No Word on Switch Release
title: New Persona Title Incoming, No Word on Switch Release
body: Yesterday, we saw the unveiling of Persona 5: The Royal. While there aren’t quite a lot of details on what this is, what is notable is the lack of Nintendo involved. The only referenced platform was PlayStation. What was originally called Persona 5R, many people speculated this was an update on the original but also an opportunity to launch on the Nintendo Switch. Speculations originally started after the announcement of main character Joker being reveled as the first DLC character in Nintendo’s Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. With more information still in the coming months, there is still opportunity of the hit JRPG making its way to the hybrid console. Until then, we will just have to continue to wait and see

summary: State of Play é uma cópia da Nintendo Direct?
title: State of Play é uma cópia da Nintendo Direct?
body:
State of Play é uma cópia da Nintendo Direct?

A Sony anunciou recentemente que terá um evento próprio para anunciar seus jogos e novidades, sendo a primeira edição neste dia 25, segunda-feira. De acordo com a empresa, “State of Play lhe dará atualizações e anúncios do mundo PlayStation. Nosso primeiro episódio mostrará os próximos softwares PS4 e PS VR, incluindo novos trailers, novos anúncios de jogos e novas gameplays.”

https://twitter.com…

View On WordPress
